errors.FREE_GROUP_CREATE_LIMIT_REACHED: You can create up to {limit} groups in the first version of the app. You currently have {current} created groups.
errors.FREE_GROUP_JOIN_LIMIT_REACHED: The user {username} already belongs to a maximum of {limit} groups.
errors.FREE_HABIT_CREATE_LIMIT_REACHED: You have already reached the maximum amount of {limit} habits that each user can create in this space.
errors.GENERIC_ERROR_MESSAGE: Something went wrong. Please refresh the page or try again.
